arguments.name: x
arguments.description: If x is nonnumeric, FORECAST and FORECAST.LINEAR return the #VALUE! error value.

arguments.name: known_y's
arguments.description: If known_y's or known_x's is empty or one has more data points than the other, FORECAST and FORECAST.LINEAR return the #N/A error value.

arguments.name: known_x's
arguments.description: If the variance of known_x's equals zero, then FORECAST and FORECAST.LINEAR return the #DIV/0! error value.
